column5: I'm sure a few of you out there are tiring from this cold winter. For those who like to ticker in the workshop, try building one of these!!!!!!!!!! http://www.chonday.com/Videos/the-writer-automaton  Stay warm..................................
Built 5 of them on the weekend...lol!  Very cool and I'd have no idea where to start making one.  Can certainly respect the craftsmanship that went into making it.
I just need a quill for the pen and ill have completed an identical writer...lol...amazing technology for the era...i wonder what its worth today ...im betting millions
Pretty ingenious, specially considering when it was designed & built.
Looks like it could be cast as the main character in the Friday fright night movie.
Looks like it could be cast as the main character in the Friday fright night movie. It kinda gives you the creeps
If anyone's willing to tackle the project, here's the template I'd like you to use.
Mike ...........Me oh my where do I start first?
Mike ...........Me oh my where do I start first? What makes Her tick..........
